A sense of reasoning was what Tucson was hoping to see out of Rodimus, and =
he nodds in agreement. 

" You're right, I need time to gather some thought=
s about what I remember reading about hydras in general...  There's a legen=
d that goes with them..  I remember it, but it's been a long time since I r=
ead up on it..  I found a pictograph of this legend, when I was on Atlantis=
, and when I had spare time to restore old artifacts..  I think I found som=
e sort of stone that was probably used for primative lithography...  Since =
I was blind, I read it by feeling the indentations in the stone slates, tha=
t I had found.  They were well carved...  Ahh, yes, I remember it.  Just ca=
me to me now.  When you cut off a hydra's head, several more grow back in i=
ts place.  So striking his heads is out of the question.  But in this scrip=
ture there was a way to slay the hydra..  Yes, you strike its body with fir=
e.  Once the body is stricken,even though the fire is something they breath=
e, it can also be detrimental to them.  I don't know if it will work on Hyd=
ras Rodimus but if we can strike his body with the power of the Matrix that=
 we both hold within us, we may just be able to strike Hydras.  But I'm not=
 completely sure of this.  It's only a legend on stone."

Nightshift moves =
in on Darkwhawk and puts his knowledge of the Martial Arts to work for him.=
  He side steps him in true Mantice fashion, and tries to confuse him and c=
atch a moment of pure distraction to use to his advantage.

" I got this gu=
ys."

Meanwhile, Tucson Prime does get Legacy's message.  He replies.

" Th=
is is Tucson Prime, I read you Legacy.  We have managed to round everyone u=
p, but we're still trying to apprehend Darkhawk.  Night Shift is attempting=
 that now.  Legacy, while I have your attention, I need to confirm some int=
el with you, regarding an ancient legend about the mythical Hydra.  From wh=
at I've read, a hydra can not be killed by decapitation, which only promote=
s the growth of multiple heads at one time.  Yet, in this legend, it gives =
the clue on how to slay the beast.  Direct fire is the only way to slay a h=
ydra.  Can this knowledge be adapted and utilized as a weapon against Hydra=
s?  Can Rodimus and I use the powers within us to subdue him as this legend=
 fortells?  I wish to confirm this before I proceede."

Outside, Rat Trap a=
nd Quickstride also get the transmission.

"This is Rat Trap, I read ya Leg=
acy, Quickstride'n I are on standby out here, just in case they need a litt=
le distraction and some backup."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston =
